q: 1. I agree to share the information provided in this survey. (Note we will not share your name, role or email address).
a: NO (Choosing this option means that your work cannot be included in the stocktake exercise. To exit the survey, choose ‘NO’, then click on the NEXT button at the bottom of the page and you will be directed to the debrief page where you will be able to click on finish to exit the survey).
